Job Description:The following experience is essential:·Experience as a Cyber Security Delivery lead, Consultant, Program manager for a minimum of 10 years.·Experience in working with security management including information governance and compliance.·Good understanding of Security Governance Practices and Risk Management, with hands on experience·Experience of security processes and standards, in particular ISO27001·Knowledge of vulnerability management across Cloud and Infrastructure, especially CSPM tool usage·Must have worked in an environment leveraging Microsoft Security tools i.e. MS Defender suite·Knowledge of Application security controls and best practices·Awareness and Ability to adapt to new security regimes·Graduate must.
